original_title: UFC Fight Night 44: Swanson vs. Stephens
overview: UFC Fight Night 44: Swanson vs. Stephens was a mixed martial arts event held at the AT&T Center in San Antonio, Texas. The event was headlined by a featherweight bout between Cub Swanson and Jeremy Stephens.
title: UFC Fight Night 44: Swanson vs. Stephens
